Articles.Content:
Hi,
During my game there was a crash. I got information to send details to support. This is a link for crash logs:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/sjckhyz05oxh39o/2018-01-01_161128.rar?dl=0

Unfortunatly I can't access my game saves. It is showing like I just start playing:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/j83l3hvu82umqsk/Zrzut ekranu 2018-01-01 18.02.15.png?dl=0

How can I recover my game data?

The persistent file for your save profile is damaged. You can replace it with one of your backups, in the Backups folder take the most recent one and rename it to just persistent.sfs (delete the timestamp). After that move it to the parent folder, overwriting the already existing, and damaged, persistent file.
